title: “Your tweets are not enough.” (LIVE from DC)
description: Trump vs. the Law, reforming the DNC, and the race in Virginia. Rep. Keith Ellison, former Deputy Attorney General Sally Yates, and Alyssa Mastromonaco join Jon, Jon, Tommy, and Dan on stage live from the Swamp.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
